key.quickshulker.config.keybind: 手持物品時按指定按鍵打開物品
key.quickshulker.config.rightClick: 手持物品時右鍵打開物品
key.quickshulker.config.keybindInInv: 在物品欄中打開游標懸停的物品
key.quickshulker.config.rightClickInInv: 在物品欄中右擊打開物品
key.quickshulker.config.rightClickClose: Right click opened shulker to close
key.quickshulker.config.supportsBundling: R-Click a shulker w/ an item to insert it
R-Click an item w/ shulker to insert it
R-Click empty slot w/ shulker to extract item
